Package ru.golubev.openweathersdk.internal

Class PollingWeatherClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.golubev.openweathersdk.internal.WeatherClientImpl
      • ru.golubev.openweathersdk.internal.PollingWeatherClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, WeatherClient
    public class PollingWeatherClientImpl
extends WeatherClientImpl
    Weather client implementation with automatic background polling for cached cities.

    Extends WeatherClientImpl to provide automatic refresh of cached weather data at regular intervals. This ensures frequently accessed weather data remains fresh without explicit API calls.

    Polling behavior:

    • Automatically starts polling after construction
    • Polls all cities currently in the cache
    • Uses configured polling interval
    • Runs async API calls to avoid blocking
    • Automatically stops polling on close()

    Use cases:

    • Applications requiring fresh data without manual refresh
    • Dashboards displaying multiple locations
    • Real-time monitoring systems
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    WeatherClientImpl, WeatherSdkConfigurer.UpdateMode.POLLING

        Constructs a polling weather client with specified configuration.
        Parameters:
        loggingEnabled - enables operation logging
        language - language for weather descriptions
        units - measurement units system
        isCacheShared - indicates if cache is shared with other clients
        responseCache - cache instance for weather data
        weatherApi - OpenWeather API client
        pollingInterval - interval between polling cycles

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Performs graceful shutdown of polling client.

        Stops polling scheduler and performs base client cleanup via WeatherClientImpl.close().

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
